title: Casino Slots v2.1.4 - 3D PC Game - Simulated Gambling
description:
Casino Slots delivers the best 3D Vegas-style casino action for your PC. This is a nice way to try out your luck on slot machines or video Blackjack without using real money. 

Each slot machine can be play by using the slot lever, clicking the video screen, or by hitting the spin button. The bet can be changed by using multiplier buttons, this allow you to multiply the bet from 1-10.

Casino Slots features an online high scoreboard that allow you to compare your luck and skill against other players from around the world. The Casino also contains an high rollers area that contains $10 slots machines.
